description:
As a customer
    I want to buy products from different zone
    So that I can pay correct shipping fee
name: Delivery by weight and different shipping zone

elements.name: I want to buy products from different zone and pay correct shipping fee

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "12th Promotion" to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain "12th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"12th Promotion All Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 5 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"12th Promotion"}

steps.name: I should see apply filter label
I should see row of select checkbox list
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select publish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see alert
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input "6th Product for Checkout" to search field
1st product of products list should contain "6th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"6th Product for CheckoutNT$59","expectText":"6th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill "3" to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included "(DBW) - LocalDelivery" of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","ezship pickup and pay in store","Local Delivery"],"text":"(DBW) - LocalDelivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included "Bank Transfer" of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Taishin","CVS via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","Credit Card via ECpay","LINE Pay","Custom","Cash on Delivery","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","Bank Transfer"],"text":"Bank Transfer"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill name to name field
I fill email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I select delivery address dropdown option included "Taipei City" of 1st delivery address dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["          State / City\n        ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County","          District\n        "],"text":"Taipei City"}

steps.name: I select delivery address dropdown option included "100 Zhongzheng District" of 2nd delivery address dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["          State / City\n        ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County","          District\n        ","100 Zhongzheng District","103 Datong District","104 Zhongshan District","105 Songshan District","106 Da'an District","108 Wanhua District","110 Xinyi District","111 Shilin District","112 Beitou District","114 Neihu District","115 Nangang District","116 Wenshan District"],"text":"100 Zhongzheng District"}

steps.name: I fill address to delivery address field
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on accept marketing checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I click on summary collapse
delivery fee should contain "NT$15"
total should contain "NT$157"
discount applied should contain "12th Promotion"
I am on Orders Page
I click on 1st row of order links
I should be redirected to Orders Show Page
order date should contain order date
customer name should contain name
customer email should contain email
customer phone should contain phone
payment type should contain "Bank Transfer"
delivery method should contain "(DBW) - LocalDelivery"
recipient name should contain name
recipient phone should contain phone
delivery fee should contain "NT$15"
total should contain "NT$157"
---ROLL BACK---
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "12th Promotion" to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain "12th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"12th Promotion All Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 6 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"12th Promotion"}

steps.name: I should see apply filter label
I should see 1 row of promotion list
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select unpublish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see 1 unpublished item
